law.catch_line: Disposition of fee charged for duplicating records.
law.text: All money received by the Department of Revenue, for supplying to persons or agencies other than state agencies information which is contained in the official files of the department, shall be promptly deposited with the State Treasurer in the same manner as provided by law for other deposits. The amount of money so deposited shall be treated as a reimbursement to the appropriation of the Department of Revenue from which the disbursements were made for expenses incurred in performing the services authorized by KRS 131.192.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 129, effective June 20, 2005. -- Created 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 64, sec. 2, effective June 19, 1958.
